info.description: Take your taste buds on a joyride with juicy marinated paneer, capsicum, and onion, all coated in flavorful Kadhai sauce. 329.8 Kcal/100g. Contains Cereals containing Gluten (Wheat), Soya and Milk & Milk Products.
